packages_intro.title: Explore Little Luxuries
packages_intro.description: We offer products that we know customers will love, and we want to ensure you have a memorable experience while shopping at Little Luxuries. Here are some of our latest products that we know you'll love.

packages.title: Custom Made t-shirts
packages.description: Choose a design from our approved list of Los Angeles themed t-shirts, and we'll make it for you. We offer a variety of sizes and colors, ensuring you find what will work and suit you best. Our t-shirts are made from quality materials, and are perfect for both tourists and locals.
